feed.title: WordPress ActivityPub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed PHP warnings by @pfefferle
  • Anonymous function lint by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/901

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.0...3.3.1

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Keep priority of Icons (only change fallbacks) by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/903
  • Suggestion: Adopt WordPress PHP Coding Standards by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/905
  • PHPCS: Enable MissingShort Sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/910
  • PHPCS: Enable NonceVerification sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/908
  • PHPCS: Enable NotPrepared check by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/906
  • PHPCS: Enable GetMetaSingle sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/907
  • PHPCS: Enable LongNotCapital sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/913
  • PHPCS: Enable CommentedOutCode sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/914

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.1...3.3.2

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 3.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: Update() activity ID is not unique by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/920
  • Prepare multi-lang support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/919
  • Fix phpdoc return type for transformer factory's get_transformer by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/921
  • PHPCS: Enable NoReservedKeywordParameterNames sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/909
  • Issue templates: add new issue type option by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/924
  • PHPCS: Enable UnusedFunctionParameter sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/911
  • PHPCS: Update workflow to fail on warnings by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/927
  • Fix link regex by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/922
  • PHPCS: Enable Commenting sniff by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/925
  • PHPCS: Include all files by default by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/930

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.2...3.3.3

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure that sticky_posts is an array by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/935
  • Improve Auto-Post-Type-Detection by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/917
  • Fire an action before a follower is removed by @akirk in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/937
  • Fixfor urls and hashtags in profiles are not converted by @danielhuesken in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/940
  • Make Intent-URL filterable by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/936
  • Only validate POST params and do not fall back by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/934
  • Replies: fix DivisionByZeroError by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/942
  • Add "visibility" feature by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/931
  • add Attribution-Domains support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/946
  • Simplify Actor-Settings by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/918
  • Prepare ?p=<id> and ?author=<id> for ActivityPub by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/894
  • npm: add @wordpress/icons to devDependencies by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/947

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/3.3.3...4.0.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Fediverse-Files video to the readme by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/949
  • Update repo url to automattic by @kraftbj in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/951
  • Provide contextual fallback for dynamic blocks by @kraftbj in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/950
  • Add wp-env support by @kraftbj in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/952
  • Improve "Serious Simple Podcasting" implementation by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/953
  • Add inbox tests to ensure that the communication always work by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/956

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.0.0...4.0.1
